name: Gummy CRush
description:
Gummy CRush - Control the fluid, single control

Play as a gummy and simply crush other gummies before the fluid filled up the jar

Controller support.

  • Unlimited gummies.
  • Crush gummies!
  • Jam version made in 72h for the Mini Jam 66: Sweets game jam.

Controls

  • Mouse Left  Click - Jump
  • Mouse Drag - Fluid control 

Credits

  • Sound/Music- RGA-GT/Lamoot.
  • Some Arts - GameArtForge.
  • Fonts - Google fonts/thekingphoenix.
  • The Floor is Jelly for inspiration.
  • You for playing ❤️.
